column4: did you make any changes to your hard drive patitioning recently?
no the only thing i did was install 11.04 to a flash drive
and you get the grub rescue prompt when you try to boot from the flash drive?
no, when i try to boot from my hd
it also saysm
it also says "error: no such device: and then a bunch of numbers
so grub is installed on your hard drive?
yes
what happens when you try to boot with/without the flash drive in?
also what OS is loaded on your hard drive?
i havent tried booting with the flash drive in because it is an older computer, should i try that?
ubuntu 10.10 on my hd
yes, try to boot from the hard drive with the flash drive in the computer-  grub is looking for the flash drive but can't find it
you should be able to choose which OS to boot from in grub, ubuntu 10.10 from hd or 11.04 from flash drive
how will i fix that so i can boot without the flas drive in?
when you get into your desktop ubuntu 10.10, try running sudo update-grub
without the flash drive in
it should remove the flash drive reference if the drive is out
ok thanks, i'll go try it now
good luck
thank you
